values: 观众；听众；读者；接见；进见；觐见；会见；拜见；谒见；倾听；关注者；支持者；爱好者；拥护者；申诉的机会

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

word_group.brief_definition: 目标受众；目标观众；目标听众
忠实听众；锁定听众；被吸引的听众
观众参与；受众参与；观众的参与
大量受众；广大观众；大众
主流观众；主流受众；主流听众
核心观众；核心受众；核心用户
无情的观众；不表示同情的观众
观众的问题；读者的问题；听众的问题

bilingual.source: The audience sat on stone seats to watch the performances.
bilingual.target: 观众坐在石座上观看表演。

bilingual.source: They were happy to talk to the interested audience.
bilingual.target: 他们很乐意与感兴趣的观众交谈。

bilingual.source: At one point, the host asked people in the audience to stand up.
bilingual.target: 有一次，主持人请观众站起来。

bilingual.source: Note where you will give time for the audience to look at a picture.
bilingual.target: 注意你将在哪里给观众时间看图片。

bilingual.source: The audience were amazed by the beautiful music the six-year-old pianist played.
bilingual.target: 观众们对六岁钢琴家演奏的美妙音乐感到惊讶。

bilingual.source: The audience is curious about how Yang Liwei became the first Chinese astronaut.
bilingual.target: 观众对杨利伟如何成为中国第一位宇航员感到好奇。

bilingual.source: At one point, the host asked people in the audience to stand up if Nicholas Winton had saved their lives.
bilingual.target: 在某个时刻，主持人请观众中被尼古拉斯·温顿救过的人站起来。

bilingual.source: She will never forget the moment when she saw all the audience clapping their hands and cheering after her performance.
bilingual.target: 她永远不会忘记在表演后看到所有观众鼓掌欢呼的那一刻。

bilingual.source: The performers of course sang in Chinese, but the music, exaggerated movements and mime helped get the meanings across to the audience.
bilingual.target: 表演者当然用中文演唱，但音乐、夸张的动作和哑剧帮助将意思传达给观众。

bilingual.source: Encouraged by this first performance and the positive reaction of the audience, I have continued to play the piano and enjoy it more every day.
bilingual.target: 受到这次首次演出和观众积极反应的鼓舞，我继续弹钢琴并且每天更享受它。

list.abstract: 《AUDIENCE》是滨崎步演唱的歌曲，发行于2000年11月1日，所属专辑《duty》。
AUDIENCE诞生于中国深圳，是深圳市紫韵科技有限公司旗下品牌，主营：数码产品，从事视听产品的设计及研发，生产基地位于中国深圳，坚持'国土花'品牌运作。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you tell the audience your name? Suzy Sheep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉观众你的名字吧？我叫小羊苏西。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you tell the audience your name? Suzy Sheep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉观众你的名字吧？我叫小羊苏西。

yingyinNormal.en: The audience are in their seats, Mr. Moon. Great!
yingyinNormal.zh: 观众们已经坐好了，伯乐先生。很好！

yingyinNormal.en: Step 3: Pander to your audience. The best public speakers know how to work around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第三：迎合你的观众优秀的演说家知道要如何迎合观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Uh, first time for me, as well as for you and the audience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我来说第一次，对你和观众来说也是第一次。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, when we're in the audience, he doesn't talk to us but he does wave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们坐在观众席，他是没说话，但有跟我们招手。

yingyinNormal.en: When I'm in a play and you're in the audience, I don't talk to you, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我演舞台剧，你坐观众席，我也不会跟你说话，是吧？

yingyinNormal.en: If there's a silence then turned that into a joke. Stay natural, self-facing and the audience will be on your side. Let's recap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果观众不笑，就当作自我解嘲。保持自然，忠实呈现自我这样观众就会喜欢你了。再复习一遍！
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Unless there's anybody in the audience that would like to volunteer to stop eating? None, not one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非观众中有人决定绝食？不，没人会。

yingyinNormal.en: A huge audience the parade draws attracts performers from all over the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来看游行的观众非常之多，这也吸引了来自世界各地的表演者。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my gosh! How many people are in the audience? A hundred? A thousand ? Don't count.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天呀！有多少观众啊？一百位？ 一千位？别数了！
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: That's what he wants. He wants to beat us. He wants to be seen doing it. He wants an audience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就得把我们都击败，想要打败我们还想要别人来见证这一刻，他想要观众。

yingyinNormal.en: Something that will start to convince the audience that you're taking control and finally that knockout all land a blow a statement that's a memorable convincing and sums up your speeches position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用可以说服观众的事情，让你能掌握主导权最后，做个强而有力的总结让观众留下深刻的印象且完全被你说服。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: I believe there was another thing you wanted to tell them, DW? You know what else the audience likes? Authenticity!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你还没说完，是吧？你们知道观众还喜欢什么吗？真实性。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes the two-dimensional effect does not turn out to be facing to the audience, because the shell is spinning in very very high speed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时二维效果最后并没有面对观众，因为烟花弹旋转速度很快。

yingyinNormal.en: First, start with some fancy footwork. A fact or an anecdote that will hook the audience and get them to pay attention to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一：华丽的起头。用一个事实或轶事来吸引观众让他们聚焦在你的演说。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: You said, You cannot lie on stage. The audience will always know what is inside your heart. I think I understand now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说“在舞台上不能骗人”，“观众一定知道你内心的想法”，我想我现在懂了。

yingyinNormal.en: In your wellcast worksheet, write down the major points that you want to get across to the audience get the idea out of your head onto the paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你的学习单上写下你最想向观众传达的事，把你的点子写在纸上。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you only get one shot to blow that audience away, so choose carefully from the list of songs I've selected for each of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们只有一次机会征服台下的观众，所以你们要慎重选择我为你们列的曲目。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a performer. You kneel down on the wire. You unhook from side, clip it on the other. The audience will think you are saluting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是表演者，在钢索上跪下来，解开侧边钩子，夹在另一边，观众会以为你在敬礼。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观众; 听众; 读者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the assembled spectators or listeners at a public event
sense_info_list.zh: 观众; 听众; 读者

examination_example.sentence: Scientists are increasingly seeking out visual artists to help them communicate their work to new <highlight>audiences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们越来越多地寻求视觉艺术家来帮助他们向新的观众传达他们的工作成果。

examination_example.sentence: The reworked version of The Four Seasons is mentioned to show that art can offer <highlight>audiences</highlight> easy access to science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提到《四季》的翻拍版本是为了说明艺术可以让观众更容易地接触到科学。

sense_info_list.en: the people giving or likely to give attention to something

examination_example.sentence: "Artists help scientists reach a broader <highlight>audience</highlight> and make emotional connections that enhance learning."
examination_example.sentence_trans: "艺术家帮助科学家接触到更广泛的受众，并建立情感联系，从而促进学习。"

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

word_usage.usage: audience表示“观众；听众”时，是集合名词，当视其为一个群体而强调整体时，其谓语动词要用单数; 但如果强调每个人相对的独立性时，其谓语动词要用复数形式，如：The audience was/were clapping for 10 minutes. 观众鼓掌达10分钟之久。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观众; 听众; 读者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the assembled spectators or listeners at a public event
sense_info_list.zh: 观众; 听众; 读者

examination_example.sentence: I'm excited to explain to the <highlight>audience</highlight> what my book is really about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很高兴能向观众解释我的书到底是关于什么的。

examination_example.sentence: They are constantly seeking approval from their <highlight>audience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不断地寻求观众的认可。

examination_example.sentence: Good science journalists are specialists in making complex topics accessible to a general <highlight>audience</highlight>, while adhering to scientific accuracy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 优秀的科学记者是专家，他们在保持科学准确性的同时，使复杂的话题为一般读者所了解。

sense_info_list.en: the people giving or likely to give attention to something

examination_example.sentence: Shulman concedes that the use of jargon is appropriate with scientific <highlight>audiences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 舒尔曼承认，对科学读者来说，行话的使用是合适的。

examination_example.sentence: The importance of effective communication with a general <highlight>audience</highlight> is not limited to hot issues like climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与大众有效沟通的重要性并不局限于气候变化这样的热点问题。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 护理人员, 服务员; 多指跟随某人并为其服务的人。也可指一般意义的"服务员"。
听众, 常指观看戏剧、电影、讲演以及电视节目的观众, 无复数形式。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观众; 听众; 读者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the assembled spectators or listeners at a public event
sense_info_list.zh: 观众; 听众; 读者

examination_example.sentence: He walked across the stage as the <highlight>audience</highlight> cheered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在观众的欢呼声中走过舞台。

examination_example.sentence: Jody has created several different presentations, which she gives to different types of <highlight>audiences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔迪为不同类型的观众创作了几个不同的演讲。

examination_example.sentence: Why does Jody Hubbard show pictures of beautiful women to her <highlight>audiences</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么乔迪·哈伯德向观众展示美女的照片？

sense_info_list.en: the people giving or likely to give attention to something

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 护理人员，服务员; 多指跟随某人并为其服务的人。也可指一般意义的"服务员"。
听众，常指观看戏剧、电影、讲演以及电视节目的观众，无复数形式。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观众; 听众; 读者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the assembled spectators or listeners at a public event
sense_info_list.zh: 观众; 听众; 读者

examination_example.sentence: The theater <highlight>audience</highlight> said good-bye as Bradford locked the doors for the last time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当布拉德福最后一次锁上门时，剧院的观众们和他告别。

examination_example.sentence: Despite the celebrations, though, in the U. S. the jazz <highlight>audience</highlight> continues to shrink and grow older.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而尽管有庆祝活动，但在美国，爵士乐观众继续减少并变老。

examination_example.sentence: To help our <highlight>audience</highlight> have a better understanding of this extreme weather, we have invited Prof. Torres to our studio this evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了帮助观众更好地了解这种极端天气，我们今晚邀请了托雷斯教授来到演播室。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 护理人员，服务员；多指跟随某人并为其服务的人。也可指一般意义的"服务员"。
听众，常指观看戏剧、电影、讲演以及电视节目的观众，无复数形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: how to offer a full performance in front of the <highlight>audience</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何在观众面前提供完整的表演

examination_example.sentence: Another way of dealing with public speaking fears is using the <highlight>audience</highlight>'s positive energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处理公众演讲恐惧的另一种方法是利用观众的正能量。

examination_example.sentence: Do you want to be part of the live <highlight>audience</highlight>（观众)?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你想成为现场观众的一部分吗?

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态
